context_evidences: - In her statement, Riley said she went together with Musk to Epstein's house once as part of "an itinerary of appointments." Reference: https://www.businessinsider.com/talulah-riley-denies-child-bride-ghislaine-maxwell-elon-musk-2020-7 published on 2020-07-06 09:27:44

- The photo of Musk standing next to Maxwell was brought to light in 2019, and a representative for Musk told Business Insider at the time that Maxwell "simply inserted herself behind him in a photo he was posing for without his knowledge." The photo began recirculating on Twitter after Maxwell's arrest on Thursday . Musk tweeted on Thursday that he did not know her, saying she "photobombed" him. Reference: https://www.businessinsider.com/talulah-riley-denies-child-bride-ghislaine-maxwell-elon-musk-2020-7 published on 2020-07-06 09:27:44

- Maxwell, who allegedly groomed young girls for convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein, was arrested by the FBI at her home in New Hampshire on Thursday. Reference: https://www.businessinsider.com/elon-musk-denies-knowing-ghislaine-maxwell-2014-image-surfaces-questions-2020-7 published on 2020-07-03 13:36:31

- Epstein — who killed himself in jail in August 2019 — claimed in 2018 to a New York Times reporter that he had given advice to Musk while he debated taking Tesla provider. Musk's spokesperson denied the claim. Reference: https://www.businessinsider.com/elon-musk-denies-knowing-ghislaine-maxwell-2014-image-surfaces-questions-2020-7 published on 2020-07-03 13:36:31
correction_response:
This tweet is potentially misleading. While it's true that Elon Musk visited Epstein's Manhattan residence once, he has consistently denied having a personal relationship with Epstein or Ghislaine Maxwell. Musk's visit was reportedly due to curiosity from his then-partner, Talulah Riley, and he declined Epstein's invitations to visit his island. The photo with Maxwell was explained as her photobombing Musk without his knowledge. There's no evidence to suggest Musk visited Epstein 12 times as the tweet claims. 
References: 
https://www.businessinsider.com/talulah-riley-denies-child-bride-ghislaine-maxwell-elon-musk-2020-7
https://www.businessinsider.com/elon-musk-denies-knowing-ghislaine-maxwell-2014-image-surfaces-questions-2020-7
note_1_text: There appears that there is no data to support this claim. Various internet sources claim that this is a fabrication.    https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/musk-jet-epstein-island/
note_2_text: This is a fake map by @wawajawn, spread by @AnonOpsSE and @keithedwards.    Keith Edwards is a former comm director for the FL Dem gubernatorial candidate Nikki Fried's 2022 campaign. He also once worked for the Lincoln Project, an anti-Trump organization.    Source: https://www.snopes.com/fact-check/musk-jet-epstein-island/
queries:

refute_evidences: - In January of this year two sources told Business Insider that Jeffrey Epstein set up Musk's brother, Kimbal, with a woman in an attempt to get close to Musk. Epstein and members of his entourage were given a private tour of SpaceX's California facility in 2012, the sources said. Musk denied this on Saturday . "To the best our knowledge, he never toured SpaceX," Musk tweeted . "Don't know where that comes from." Reference: https://www.businessinsider.com/talulah-riley-denies-child-bride-ghislaine-maxwell-elon-musk-2020-7 published on 2020-07-06 09:27:44

- "Ghislaine simply inserted herself behind him in a photo he was posing for without his knowledge," they told Business Insider. Reference: https://www.businessinsider.com/elon-musk-denies-knowing-ghislaine-maxwell-2014-image-surfaces-questions-2020-7 published on 2020-07-03 13:36:31

- "Don't know Ghislaine at all. She photobombed me once at a Vanity Fair party several years ago," Musk tweeted early Friday. Reference: https://www.businessinsider.com/elon-musk-denies-knowing-ghislaine-maxwell-2014-image-surfaces-questions-2020-7 published on 2020-07-03 13:36:31

- Musk told Vanity Fair in July last year that he'd been to Epstein's Manhattan residence with Riley. "Several years ago, I was at his house in Manhattan for about 30 minutes in the middle of the afternoon with Talulah, as she was curious about meeting this strange person for a novel she was writing," he said. "We did not see anything inappropriate at all, apart from weird art. He tried repeatedly to get me to visit his island. I declined." Reference: https://www.businessinsider.com/talulah-riley-denies-child-bride-ghislaine-maxwell-elon-musk-2020-7 published on 2020-07-06 09:27:44

tweet_text: For those wondering what Elon has to hide by deleting #elonjet Elon visited Epstein 12x up until his death. But according to Elon he never knew him and was photo bombed by Maxwell. Truth tells a different story and according to Twitter TOS old history of flight tracking is okay https://t.co/SOCby0OS9F
